page.title: 14ASTON DOWN AIRFIELD
page.content:
The airfield has got 12 hangars; in three there are old aircraft. There is a two-mile runway. There is a Glider Club every Saturday and Sunday. They have just found 100 metal shells there. Mr. Flowers owns one part of the old runway and we own the other part of it. Also there are two bomb shelters; one cow has already died in one of them. In the fields they grow grass and this is used for hay and sileage. The only problem is that the old runway can break the cutter and turner if you are not careful, and it costs a lot to repair them. The top part of the field is stone and bits of metal so you cannot really mow it.
{BEN FUDGE aged 9.
